name: Melanie (Teenage Suburbia Studios)
description:
"Do you remember what you did?"

Melanie is a super short psychological 'horror' Visual Novel that tells Melanie's story. Playing more into the feeling of uneasiness and psychological disturbance rather than straight out "horror", Melanie sets out to do nothing than tell someone's story. Things aren't always what they appear to be...

Word Count: 964

Created, with love, throughout September 2021, for the 3rd Annual Spooktober Visual Novel Jam, hosted by DevTalk, by Mark Alan Knapp Jr. and Melanie.

Character Art: https://sutemo.itch.io/female-character

Backgrounds: https://potat0master.itch.io/free-visual-novel-backgrounds-starter-pack-2

https://pixabay.com/illustrations/wallpaper-texture-soap-bubbles-978000/

Thank you for hearing Melanie's Story!

--------

P.S. Melanie asks that you DON'T play with the "imnotsorry.txt" file. Don't even download it. Disregard it. It's a virus.

Probably.
